formulas.name: Binomial Expansion
formulas.formula: (a + b)^n = Σ(r=0 to n) nCr · a^(n−r) · b^r

formulas.name: General Term
formulas.description: The (r+1)th term of the binomial expansion. Watch signs if b is negative!

formulas.name: Middle Term (Even n)
formulas.formula: T_{(n/2)+1} is the single middle term
formulas.description: When n is even, there is exactly one middle term

formulas.name: Middle Terms (Odd n)
formulas.formula: T_{(n+1)/2} and T_{(n+3)/2} are the two middle terms
formulas.description: When n is odd, there are two middle terms

formulas.name: Term Independent of x
formulas.formula: Set power of x in general term = 0 and solve for r
formulas.description: Find r such that the exponent of x in T_{r+1} equals zero

formulas.name: Sum of Coefficients
formulas.formula: Put x = 1 to get sum of all coefficients

formulas.name: Alternating Sum of Coefficients
formulas.description: Alternating sum of binomial coefficients equals zero

formulas.name: Greatest Coefficient
formulas.formula: nC(n/2) when n is even; nC((n−1)/2) or nC((n+1)/2) when n is odd
formulas.description: The largest binomial coefficient in the expansion

formulas.name: Greatest Term
formulas.formula: T_{r+1}/T_r ≥ 1 gives range of r for greatest term
formulas.description: Compare consecutive terms to find the greatest one

formulas.name: Pascal's Rule
formulas.description: Each entry in Pascal's triangle is sum of two entries above it
